name: Super Sleepio
description:
Help Sleepio go to bed by putting out all the candles in the level. To do this you will need to hop on platforms, dodge imps, and flip switches to open doors.

Use the arrow keys to move. Up will make you jump and use down to flip switches. Press escape to reset the level

Embeded HTML5 version is the Demo. Download is full version.

Demo version features 11 levels.

Full version features 30+ levels.
